definitions.definition: the act of using movements of your hands and body, and expressions on your face, without speech, to communicate emotions and actions or to tell a story:
examples: The first scene was performed in mime.

definitions.definition: to act or tell a story in mime:
examples: The whole of the banquet scene is mimed.

definitions.definition: to pretend to sing, play, or say something without making any sound:
examples: Most of the bands that appear on the show just mime to a recording of their songs.
